/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  --generate-code=arch=compute_60,code=[compute_60,sm_60] --generate-code=arch=compute_61,code=[compute_61,sm_61] --generate-code=arch=compute_62,code=[compute_62,sm_62] -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/icp_gpu.dir/icp.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/icp_gpu.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -ldl -llz4 -lm -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread
